targets.query: SELECT last("memory_max") - last("memory_used") FROM "memory_usage" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT "l_PID" as "PID","m_CPU_Percent" as "CPU","n_MEM_Percent" as "内存","o_Exec" as "命令行" FROM Processes_List where ("Host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND time > now() - 60s GROUP BY "Host"::tag,"k_ProcessName"::tag
SELECT "l_PID" as "PID","m_CPU_Percent" as "CPU","n_MEM_Percent" as "内存","o_Exec" as "命令行" FROM Processes_List where ("Host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "Host"::tag,"k_ProcessName"::tag

SELECT last("l_Disk_Used") / last("k_Disk_Max") * 100 FROM "Disk_Usage" WHERE ("Host"::tag =~ /^$Host$/ AND "i_Partition_Name"::tag =~ /^$Partition_Name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("m_Http_Code") as "Http_Code",last("n_Response_Time") as "Response_Time" FROM "Web_Status" WHERE ("Host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "j_Web_Port"::tag, "Host"::tag, "i_Web_Name"::tag

SELECT last("m_Data_Value") as "当前数据量" FROM "Business_Data" WHERE ("Host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "Host"::tag, "i_Data_Name"::tag, "k_Data_Comment"::tag
